posts.post_text: July 17, 2016 at 4:57 PM#21. Patch a dummy dimmer to an unused DMX address2. Store that dimmer at 100% in a flash button3. Store 2 cues to an empty executor, and put the 2 desired commands into the CMD cell of those cues4. Set the fader for that executor to XFade5. Create a DMX remote for the DMX address of the dummy dimmer that controls the fader of the CMD executor you just made.6. Press the flash button to go to one variable value, unpress to go to the other.
